name: UniScale Restore
author: kim2091
description: UniScale_Restore has strong compression removal that helps with restoring heavily compressed or noisy images. It is intended to compete with BSRGAN. Trained with BSRGAN_Resize and Combo_Noise in traiNNer.
dataset: Custom Dataset consisting of lossless 4k frames from Metal Arms: Glitch in the System, Just Cause 3, Dirt 3, Forza Horizon 3, Sleeping Dogs, and self-edited photos from SignatureEdits
